INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Product(
) SELECT A.product_id,A.Stat_Dt,Sale_Count,Sale_Amount,Rent_Count,Rent_Amount,'admin',now() FROM ( SELECT tb.Product_ID, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt,IFNULL(Order_Count,0) Sale_Count, IFNULL(Order_Amount,0) Sale_Amount,'admin', NOW() FROM TB_Product tb left join ( SELECT Product_Id, Count(Work_Seq) Order_Count, Sum(Product_Price) Order_Amount FROM TB_Work_Bottle WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0308') AND DATE_FORMAT(Create_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Group by Product_Id ) tc on tb.Product_ID = tc.Product_ID )A, ( SELECT tb.Product_ID, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt,IFNULL(Order_Count,0) Rent_Count, IFNULL(Order_Amount,0) Rent_Amount,'admin', NOW() FROM TB_Product tb left join ( SELECT Product_Id, Count(Work_Seq) Order_Count, Sum(Product_Price) Order_Amount FROM TB_Work_Bottle WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0309') AND DATE_FORMAT(Create_dt,'%Y/%m/%d')= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Group by Product_Id ) tc on tb.Product_ID = tc.Product_ID ) B WHERE A.Product_ID= B.Product_ID

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Product(
) SELECT Product_ID , LEFT(Stat_Dt,7) , SUM(Sale_Count) , SUM(Sale_Amount) , SUM(Rent_Count) , SUM(Rent_Amount) , 'admin' , NOW() FROM TB_Daily_Stat_product WHERE LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m') GROUP BY Product_ID,LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)
